Title: normalizeUTF8NFC
Description: Converts a string to NFC normalized form, assuming the string is valid UTF8-encoded text.
String transformed to NFC normalization form. String.
Examples: SELECT length('â'), normalizeUTF8NFC('â') AS nfc, length(nfc) AS nfc_len;
EffectiveSQLsRefined: SELECT length('â'), normalizeUTF8NFC('â') AS nfc, length(nfc) AS nfc_len;
